author: James Carr
comment: I like the idea, has a lot of interesting features. Hate the 'system maintenance' which happens whenever something screwy happens in china, or any anniversary or something happens in china. Not a big fan of being monitored by the ccp either.

People nearby, radar, throw bottle & shake feature didn't work. Plus, other user can't added me even i have wechat ID. They're can't find me on people nearby & by contact numbrt at all even after i try to fix the problem for twice. So disappointed with your apps

comment: i am very unsatisfied with this app. i was trying to add a friend into a group but all of a sudden i wasnt able to,the reason being that i have violated wechat regulations in on of my post. however i have posted the same post in another group and that group did not have such an issue. please address this problem as quick as possible and i will give this app 5 stars.

author: Dianne Kamal
comment: This apps has been working great but recently the shake feature is not working and it keep showing "no result found". Please help to fix this problem. I love this apps and I would appreciate if you can fix the problem quickly. Thank you in advance.

This app does not encrypt your chat data. It uses non-secure http instead of https, meaning anyone can look at your messages as they travel through the internet. But I suppose that's by design as this is a Chinese app.

author: Ari Djemana
comment: I just confused with security about this app? Scan qrqode friend? For what purpose? There is a technology call sms for verification and being used by bank and other application with high security concerns. For your information. There is no perfect security in this world. Even you shily qrcode still can be hacked anyway.

this app just fine. but however the security verification was a troublesome. there's no need for the security verification. you'll have to wait for the verify number ,etc. so fix it and just put away the idea for that security verification. it's not working, it'll only make people hate the app. tq
